messages.title: Will the local Conservatives stand up for us?
messages.content: The evidence so far suggests Conservative inaction on local issues concerning post office closures and job losses, acceptance of a donation from a developer, and Conservative-run Southampton City Council employing a spin doctor while local services struggled.

messages.title: Help us build a fairer Britain
messages.content: Sandra Gidley and the local Lib Dems wish for your support, highlighting a tax plan from Nick Clegg to put money back in your pocket.

messages.title: Sandra keeps her promises
messages.content: In 2005 Sandra promised to do everything she could to help communities, work for constituents, take no paid directorships and report back regularly; she has kept these promises.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Nick Clegg's tax plan means that you will pay no tax on the first £10,000 you earn - cutting most tax bills by £700.
Sandra is a well-respected voice on health and the NHS. She has been leading the fight to get better out-of-hours care and helping save local hospitals from closure.

mentions.candidate: Sandra Gidley has helped over 20,000 people since being first elected. Sandra will defend our NHS.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour can't win in Romsey and Southampton North. Voting for them will just help elect the Conservative MP.

issues.health: Sandra is a well-respected voice on health and the NHS. From leading the fight to get better out-of-hours care and helping save local hospitals from closure, Sandra will defend our NHS.

housing.content: The Conservatives accepted a £5,000 donation from a developer shortly after voting to shoehorn extra houses into our local area.

leaflet.personalStatement: Sandra Gidley's contract with you outlines her commitment to local constituents, promising to make sure their voice is heard locally and at Westminster.

politicalExperience.achievements: Sandra has helped over 20,000 people since being first elected.

contactInformation.address: FREEPOST, 3A Victoria Place, Love Lane, ROMSEY SO51 8DE

quotes.text: Sandra Gidley's expenses: A clean bill of health

images.caption: Pie chart showing win probability, with Lib Dems at 45%, Conservatives at 44%, and Labour at 9%
Photos of Sandra Gidley with local police and community members
